title: Can't Login to Support
body: I've tried a few times already, and it is starting to irritate me? When I do click "login" it takes me to the login page as usual, but then signs me off without my say, and gives me an error, sometimes it just refreshes the page and just goes through the same cycle over and over again. Please help??

replies.body: Try logging in and out a couple times to refresh that page, and possibly go ahead and [**clear your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) too. If those don't work, you can always shoot us a ticket via emailing support@riotgames.com
I had to try 3 or 4 times before it finally recognized I was logged in and let me submit a ticket.
Good to know I'm not the only one with this problem.
